_welcome_message: Welcome to LuvAudioDL, type 'help' to get help.

_help_map.exit:
Exits the prompt, if you're in one. 

    --silent: no goodbye message :c
_help_map.playlist:
Manages your playlists. 

    make:
        makes playlists
    remove:
        removes playlists
    ls:
        lists your playlists
